blogPost.excerpt: Directual is the only no-code platform that combines the flexibility, scalability, and security of traditional coding, with a modern, visual development approach. You can build scalable, secure and sophisticated apps with Directual.
blogPost.body: Directual is the only no-code platform that combines the flexibility, scalability, and security of traditional coding, with a modern, visual development approach. You can build scalable, secure and sophisticated apps with Directual.
blogPost.title: Directual - Power of Coding in No-code format
blogPost.author: Pavel Ershov

localize.description: Directual是唯一的无代码平台，它结合了传统编码的灵活性、可扩展性和安全性，以及现代的可视化开发方法。您可以使用Directual构建可扩展、安全和复杂的应用程序。
Directual是唯一的無代碼平臺，它結合了傳統編碼的靈活性、可擴展性和安全性，以及現代的可視化開發方法。您可以使用Directual構建可擴展、安全和複雜的應用程序。

previous.excerpt: Doppler Share is an easy way to share one-off secrets in a simple end-to-end encrypted way where the links auto-expire after a certain number of views and days.
previous.title: Doppler Share - Share one-off secrets with end-to-end encryption 🤫

localize.description: 多普勒分享是一种简单的端到端加密分享一次性秘密的方式，链接在一定的浏览量和天数后自动失效。
localize.tagline: 使用端到端加密共享一次性秘密 🤫。

localize.description: 多普勒分享是一種簡單的端到端加密分享一次性祕密的方式，鏈接在一定的瀏覽量和天數後自動失效。
localize.tagline: 使用端到端加密共享一次性祕密 🤫。

next.excerpt: MyBee App is a platform to connect skilled trades with clients in real-time. We also help small businesses generate more revenue fast by analyzing growth strategies using the power of AI.
next.title: MyBee App - Connecting skilled-trades with clients in real time

localize.description: MyBee App是一个实时连接熟练交易与客户的平台。我们还通过利用人工智能的力量分析发展战略，帮助小企业快速创造更多的收入。
localize.tagline: 将熟练的交易与客户实时连接起来。

localize.description: MyBee App是一個實時連接熟練交易與客戶的平臺。我們還通過利用人工智能的力量分析發展戰略，幫助小企業快速創造更多的收入。
localize.tagline: 將熟練的交易與客戶實時連接起來。
